name: marp-slides
description: Marpでスライドを管理するリポジトリ

scripts.build: marp -I slides --html --no-pdf --theme-set themes --output dist/ && npm run copy:images && npm run generate:index
scripts.build:pdf: marp -I slides --pdf --theme-set themes --output dist/ && npm run copy:images && npm run generate:index
scripts.build:pptx: marp -I slides --pptx --theme-set themes --output dist/ && npm run copy:images && npm run generate:index
